synonyms: kṛṣṇa-bhakti—devotional service to Lord Kṛṣṇa; haya—is; abhidheya-pradhāna—the chief function of the living entity; bhakti-mukha—of the face of devotional service; nirīkṣaka—observers; karma-yoga-jñāna—fruitive activities, mystic yoga and speculative knowledge.
translation: "Devotional service to Kṛṣṇa is the chief function of the living entity. There are different methods for the liberation of the conditioned soul-karma, jñāna, yoga and bhakti-but all are dependent on bhakti.
